sections.content: Welcome to Diat, the application revolutionizing the way you plan and document projects.
Diat takes a visual approach to project planning and documenting, integrating diagram and text elements seamlessly.
Not just limited to diagrams or text, Diat combines diagram editing with document editing for a unified experience.
With Diat, collate and edit rich text documents, images, and summarised URLs in a single application.

aboutSection.title: Learn More About Us
contentParagraphs: We are a company focused on innovation. Our mission is to provide cutting-edge solutions.
With a team of dedicated professionals, we strive for excellence in all our projects.
Our approach is client-centric, ensuring satisfaction and value.
Explore our services and discover how we can contribute to your success.
